commit.message:
final.c (final): Allow notes to not have computed addresses; kill no longer needed STACK_REGS ifdef.

	* final.c (final):  Allow notes to not have computed addresses;
	kill no longer needed STACK_REGS ifdef.

From-SVN: r54190

+	kill no longer needed STACK_REGS ifdef.
